item.name: estateCommentList
item.param:
data\[\d+\]\.\w+, data\[\d+\]\.building\.name, data\[\d+\]\.user\.nickname,
pagination\.begin, pagination\.pageSize, pagination\.count, pagination\.currentPage

item.name: commonCommentList
item.param: data\[\d+\]\.\w+, data\[\d+\]\.building\.name, data\[\d+\]\.user\.nickname, data\[\d+\]\.commonCommentType\.desc, pagination\.begin, pagination\.pageSize, pagination\.count, pagination\.currentPage
